description: Updates the specified system. You don't need to run this action after updating a workflow. Any deployment that uses the system will see the changes in the system when it is redeployed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the system to be updated. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:system:SYSTEMNAME.

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: The DefinitionDocument that contains the updated system definition. The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value. The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_params.name: language
nested_params.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

parameters.name: compatibleNamespaceVersion
parameters.description: The version of the user's namespace. Defaults to the latest version of the user's namespace. If no value is specified, the latest version is used by default.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the system.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system was created.
